questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a museum
D) In a zoo or wildlife sanctuary

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) An animal near a water body

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A bear
C) A large tree
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A bird
C) A bear
D) A person

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A bear
C) A rock
D) A bird

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A city skyline
B) Trees and plants
C) A mountain range
D) A building

What kind of bear is depicted in the photo?
A) Polar bear
B) Grizzly bear
C) Black bear
D) Panda bear

What is the bear doing in the photo?
A) Climbing a tree
B) Swimming
C) Walking near a water body
D) Eating food

What is the color of the water in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Clear
D) Brown

What is the bear walking on?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) Rock or concrete surface
D) Wooden platform

What kind of plants are in the background?
A) Cacti
B) Flowering plants
C) Tall grasses
D) Palm trees

How many animals are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

A) Sitting
B) Standing on two legs
C) Walking on four legs
D) Lying down

What is the color of the bear’s fur?
A) White
B) Brown
C) Black and brown
D) Grey

What is the bear's position relative to the water?
A) In the water
B) Far away from the water
C) Near the water
D) On the water

What is the bear's head position?
A) Looking up
B) Looking down
C) Looking straight ahead
D) Turned to the side

What is the bear’s size compared to the surrounding elements?
A) Smaller
B) Larger
C) Same size
D) Not comparable

A) Withered
B) Blooming
C) Covered in snow
D) Dry

What is the primary color of the plants in the background?
A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Green
D) Blue

A) Smooth
B) Fluffy and wet
C) Wet
D) Matted

What is the dominant color in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Baige
D) Black

What is the bear’s direction of movement?
A) Towards the camera
B) Away from the camera
C) Left to right
D) Right to left

A) Clear
B) Murky
C) Sparkling
D) Dry

What type of bird is in the water?
A) Duck or Swan
B) Swan
C) Seagull
D) Eagle

A) Drinking water
B) Walking
C) Running
D) Resting

B) Bear walking
C) Bear playing
D) Bear sleeping

B) Dry
C) Covered in moss

C) Dim lighting

A) Flying
B) Swimming
C) Eating
D) Diving

B) Downwards

A) A bird
